subject: Re: [junit] Junit - hardware and O/S info
msgSnippet: ... Renee, If Java runs on it so does JUnit (in one form or another); it s just another library. -- Jason Rogers Where there is no vision, the people
messageBody:
On Mon, 2004-03-08 at 21:51, renee_bokhoor wrote:
> We have some hardware and operating systems our project is looking at
> and we would like to know if Junit interfaces with Red Hat Linux 3 -
> 64bit on an Itanium, and Solaris 9 on SUN Fire V240, V440 and SUN
> Blades 1500.
>
> Thanks for your response,
> Renee

Renee,

If Java runs on it so does JUnit (in one form or another); it's just
another library.

--
Jason Rogers

"Where there is no vision, the people perish..."
Bible, Proverbs 29:18
